The Christmas Chronicles, direceted by Clay Caytis and released on Nov 22, 2018 is a really great movie, because if we talk about Christmas movies this is genuinely one of the best ones.
The film is about the two siblings Kate and Teddy Pierce that were going to hatch a plan to capture Santa Claus on Christmas Eve. When the plan goes awry, the children join forces with St. Nicholas and his loyal elves to save the vacation before it's too late. 
The plot actually seems very intriguing and sometimes predictable.
For the year in which the film was released, the special effects are not bad, that is, they are decent, as well as the photography and stuff.
The acting is definitely quite well worked, the expressions, the dialogues, the fluency in which they speak, definitely a great work! 
In my opinion this may be one of the best Christmas movies I’ve seen in a while, the plot is very emotional and joyful at the same time. 
I really like this movie because is basically made for almost all ages, and it’s a solid option if you are going to watch it next to your family on a cold winter night at house.
Hating this movie is like hating Santa Claus.
